overview: Join the award-winning Imagination Movers as they perform in concert at the Baton Rouge River Center in this new LPB special. Recorded live, the energetic quartet from New Orleans had the audience jumping. Join the Movers as they perform "Clean My Room," "I Want My Mommy," "Stir It Up," and some special new songs in this exciting new special.
title: Imagination Movers LIVE!
